headline: Should Rockwell’s Cloud and Capacity Bet Require Action From Rockwell Automation (ROK) Investors?
summary: In recent days, Rockwell Automation has been recognized across 20 of Gartner’s 2025 Hype Cycles and outlined a US$2.00 billion investment plan that includes a major new manufacturing campus in Southeastern Wisconsin, alongside enhancements to its cloud-native Manufacturing Execution System portfolio. This combination of third-party validation and capacity expansion underscores Rockwell Automation’s push to lead industrial automation through innovation, cloud-connected operations, and scaled...

headline: Share Offerings Prompt Huge Insider Buying in These 3 Biotechs
summary: Secondary offerings from biotechs Immunovant, Kymera Therapeutics, and Wave Life Sciences prompted some huge insider buying recently.

headline: Gartner® Report: Nozomi Networks recognized as the Company to Beat for AI in Cyber-Physical Systems Security
summary: Nozomi Networks, offering solutions in OT, IoT and CPS security, today announced it has been recognized as the company to beat for AI in Cyber-Physical Systems Security in the Gartner report for AI Vendor Races.

raw.headline: Gartner® Report: Nozomi Networks recognized as the Company to Beat for AI in Cyber-Physical Systems Security

headline: CFOs targeting both business growth and cost reductions in 2026
summary: A new survey by Gartner shows the “very explicit tension” finance chiefs expect to face in the year ahead.
